post.text: So...what exactly did we learn tonight about Donald Trump's economic plan? #RNCinCLE

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: Only economic policy of Mr.Trump to save his Casinos from bankruptcy.

replies.author: Jenifer
replies.text: You should worry about your own country ! ! !

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: What a dumb statement. He has had at least 500 companies. He filed 4 or 5 bankruptcies. Big deal. Very small in comparison. If other states didn't legalize gambling, than alantic city would still be the east coast place to gamble.

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: Its like when red box and digital streaming came out, blockbuster, and 48 hour video went out of business. Same issue. Economy changed.
